name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performs her original song 'Sparks' in a vibrant 3D virtual environment.
Kiara transitions to a virtual KFP (Kiara Fried Phoenix) restaurant for an MC segment, interacting with the environment and virtual customers.

subtitles.original: Kikeriki!
subtitles.english: Kikeriki!

subtitles.original: Hi everybody!
subtitles.english: Hi everybody!

subtitles.original: My voice, it works! It's working! Ah!
subtitles.english: My voice, it works! It's working! Ah!

subtitles.original: Hi KFP! Oh wait, wait, wait.
subtitles.english: Hi KFP! Oh wait, wait, wait.

subtitles.original: You have so much to react to, you have me to react to,
subtitles.english: You have so much to react to, you have me to react to,

subtitles.original: but you have this place to react to, right?
subtitles.english: but you have this place to react to, right?

subtitles.original: Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Oh my god!

subtitles.original: Yes, we started with a banger, we started with Sparks.
subtitles.english: Yes, we started with a banger, we started with Sparks.

subtitles.original: One of your favorites, I think, right?
subtitles.english: One of your favorites, I think, right?

subtitles.original: Same for me!
subtitles.english: Same for me!

subtitles.original: Kikeriki! みなさん、おはようございます！
subtitles.english: Kikeriki! Good morning, everyone!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: It's Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English 1st Generation Myth. Yeah!
subtitles.english: It's Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English 1st Generation Myth. Yeah!

subtitles.original: It's real! Oh my god! Yes, this is KFP!
subtitles.english: It's real! Oh my god! Yes, this is KFP!

subtitles.original: Whoa! So many details! We shall look around. Ooh!
subtitles.english: Whoa! So many details! We shall look around. Ooh!

subtitles.original: Hi! Oh, what's your name?
subtitles.english: Hi! Oh, what's your name?

subtitles.original: Harry? Harry, oh, nice to meet you, Harry.
subtitles.english: Harry? Harry, oh, nice to meet you, Harry.

subtitles.original: How you doing today? What are you eating?
subtitles.english: How you doing today? What are you eating?

subtitles.original: Oh, he's eating the Yagoo Burger!
subtitles.english: Oh, he's eating the Yagoo Burger!

subtitles.original: Which is also on the menu up there, yeah!
subtitles.english: Which is also on the menu up there, yeah!

subtitles.original: And also the chicken bucket. Oh my god!
subtitles.english: And also the chicken bucket. Oh my god!

subtitles.original: How you eating so much alone?
subtitles.english: How you eating so much alone?

subtitles.original: I can't even relate. He's eating way too much.
subtitles.english: I can't even relate. He's eating way too much.

subtitles.original: Two pieces of fries, Yagoo Burger, a shake probably, Oreo shake...
subtitles.english: Two pieces of fries, Yagoo Burger, a shake probably, Oreo shake...

subtitles.original: and the chicken bucket! Damn!
subtitles.english: and the chicken bucket! Damn!

subtitles.original: Ooh, I'm also getting hungry, hungry!
subtitles.english: Ooh, I'm also getting hungry, hungry!

subtitles.original: Let's look around a bit more.
subtitles.english: Let's look around a bit more.

subtitles.original: We have the menus up there.
subtitles.english: We have the menus up there.

subtitles.original: Inspired by, of course, the real KFC menu,
subtitles.english: Inspired by, of course, the real KFC menu,

subtitles.original: cuz this is the real deal.
subtitles.english: cuz this is the real deal.

subtitles.original: There's hot dogs, hamburgers, Smart...
subtitles.english: There's hot dogs, hamburgers, Smart...

subtitles.original: What the hell is a Smart Burger? I don't know.
subtitles.english: What the hell is a Smart Burger? I don't know.

subtitles.original: Who decided on that one? I don't know anything about the Smart Burger.
subtitles.english: Who decided on that one? I don't know anything about the Smart Burger.

subtitles.original: Do I get smart if I eat that?
subtitles.english: Do I get smart if I eat that?

subtitles.original: And we have the Phoenix Burger, of course.
subtitles.english: And we have the Phoenix Burger, of course.

subtitles.original: Yagoo Burger apparently is black, I didn't know about that.
subtitles.english: Yagoo Burger apparently is black, I didn't know about that.

subtitles.original: So much good-looking stuff!
subtitles.english: So much good-looking stuff!

subtitles.original: And we have a kitchen in the back. Everything! Yay!
subtitles.english: And we have a kitchen in the back. Everything! Yay!

subtitles.original: It's so cheap! I think it's cheap.
subtitles.english: It's so cheap! I think it's cheap.

subtitles.original: Let's say hi to Jimmy who just hatched again.
subtitles.english: Let's say hi to Jimmy who just hatched again.

subtitles.original: Jimmy!
subtitles.english: Jimmy!

subtitles.original: People always worry about you, Jimmy.
subtitles.english: People always worry about you, Jimmy.

subtitles.original: How you doing? You're alive again! Yay!
subtitles.english: How you doing? You're alive again! Yay!

subtitles.original: You know, I ate you recently, so I felt like
subtitles.english: You know, I ate you recently, so I felt like

subtitles.original: you deserved to be reborn. Jimmy!
subtitles.english: you deserved to be reborn. Jimmy!
